BlackFang:

BlackFang opened quickly his comlink and said "Hold on I'm on the 
way!!!"


Quickly he left the base and started to ran towards Cryaltron

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, aerosmith4e@c... wrote:
>  A Pod crashed through the white clouds of earth. Like a meteor it 
screamed across the sky. The maximal protoform inside instinctivly 
tried to salvage the ship. With little sucsess it crashed into a 
pile of sharp energon. A small shrpnel piece was jammed through the 
protoform slightly oh so slghtly penetrating his spark. The 
protoform took the shape of a nearby Falcon, but with a translucent 
body that shined blue. Inside you could see the mechanics at work, 
yet his outter body was the hardest material many had ever seen. 
Cryaltron pulled himself out of the pod and ran a 
diagnostic. "Energon posioning iminent, spark in jeapordy, death 
inevitable." The shrapel still stuck out of his chest, he broke it 
off leaving a crystal like object infront of his doomed spark. on 
his robot form shoulders were sharp extendesions of energon, as were 
his fingers and feet. In his falcon form his wings were made of the 
same. His body was basicly made of hardned energon and the spark 
encased in an energon crystal, the spark slightly ever so slighty 
pierced in the front of it. "How long do I have?" came an voice of 
experience, his exact age was unknow but he survived many 
wars. "Unclear progression unmeasurable." Cryatron snarled, "Slag 
it!" He transformed into his Falcon mode. The sun shined through him 
like a plate of glass...like he wasn't even there only leaving a 
rainbow under him as his trail. "Any maximal in rage please 
respond." He flew off blasting his thrusters as well trying to get 
as far away from the  murderous energon as he could.
